name: Murder Files
description:
EDITORS CHOICE! #1 PAID APP!
5/5: "This game blows my mind!"
5/5: "The best part is the absolutely HYSTERICAL narrator!"
5/5: "The puzzles require some real thought and the story is incredibly witty."

The hugely popular Murder Files game is now available on iPad, iPhone and iPod touch! Who shot the Mayor? As one of the detectives from the infamous Blue Toad Agency you have to eliminate suspects, get witness evidence and solve the puzzles to discover Whodunnit.

STUNNING! A beautifully animated adventure
MASSIVE! Six episodes to complete
FIENDISH! Packed with challenging puzzles
FUNNY! Quintessentially English traditional sense of humour
GAME CENTER! Collect Achievements to show off your sleuthing skills

Download Murder Files now and start solving mysteries!

Note:
*This game is NOT compatible with the iPod touch 4th generation
